title: Library
description: Your personal library for tracking a collections of your favourite books and books that are waiting to be read. Some features includes: adding, deleting and toggling read status of a book. Firestore is used to store and sync data across multiple devices.

title: Ikae
description: This is a simple landing page for a home furnishing store Ikae. Built with responsive, mobile first apporach. From PSD to HTML.

title: Tic Tac Toe
description: Play the good old Tic Tac Toe game with either your friend or against an AI. This project is to learn and practice the fundemental of module pattern using factory function to encapsulate variables and methods so that it doesn't flood the global namespace.

title: Phonebook
description: A digital phonebook to record all your family and friends mobile numbers in one place. Some features includes: Add, delete and filter numbers by name

title: Pusheen Cat Cafe
description: A tribute website to showcase the world's first Pusheen Cafe's menu selections. This project uses DOM manipulation to dynamically render the content on the page, using JavaScript to inject DOM element/node similar to the SPA concept.
